import React, { Component } from 'react' import defaultimg from "./default.jpg" const NewsItems = () => { let {title, description, imgurl, url, author, time, source} = this.props; return (
{source}
{title}

{description}

Last Updated on {new Date(time).toGMTString()}

By {author?author:"Unknown"}

Read More
) } export default NewsItems
